data.Sentence_cn: 课文44  文化的模式
data.Sentence: --- Lesson 44 Patterns of culture

data.Sentence_cn: 从出生的那一刻起，什么影响着我们?
data.Sentence: What influences us from the moment of birth?

data.Sentence_cn: 风俗一般未被认为是什么重要的课题。
data.Sentence: Custom has not commonly been regarded as a subject of any great moment.

data.Sentence_cn: 我们觉得，只有我们大脑内部的活动情况才值得研究，
data.Sentence: The inner workings of our own brains we feel to be uniquely worthy of investigation,

data.Sentence_cn: 至于风俗呢，只是些司空见惯的行为而已。
data.Sentence: but custom, we have a way of thinking, is behaviour at is most commonplace.

data.Sentence_cn: 事实上，情况正好相反。
data.Sentence: As a matter of fact, it is the other way around.

data.Sentence_cn: 从世界范围来看，
data.Sentence: Traditional custom, taken the world over,

data.Sentence_cn: 传统风俗是由许多细节性的习惯行为组成，它比任何一个养成的行为都更加引人注目，
data.Sentence: is a mass of detailed behaviour more astonishing than what any one person can ever evolve in individual actions,

data.Sentence_cn: 不管个人行为多么异常。
data.Sentence: no matter how aberrant.

data.Sentence_cn: 这只是问题的一个次要的侧面。
data.Sentence: Yet that is a rather trivial aspect of the matter.

data.Sentence_cn: 最重要的是，风俗在实践中和信仰上所起的举足轻重的作用，
data.Sentence: The fact of first-rate importance is the predominant role that custom plays in experience and in belief,

data.Sentence_cn: 以及它所表现出来的极其丰富多采的形式。
data.Sentence: and the very great varieties it may manifest.

data.Sentence_cn: 没有一个人是用纯洁而无偏见的眼光看待世界。
data.Sentence: No man ever looks at the world with pristine eyes.

data.Sentence_cn: 人们所看到的是一个受特定风俗习惯、制度和思想方式剪辑过的世界。
data.Sentence: He sees it edited by a definite set of customs and institutions and ways of thinking.

data.Sentence_cn: 甚至在哲学领域的探索中，人们也无法超越这此定型的框框。
data.Sentence: Even in his philosophical probings he cannot go behind these stereotypes;

data.Sentence_cn: 人们关于真与伪的概念依然和特定的传统风俗有关。
data.Sentence: his very concepts of the true and the false will still have reference to his particular traditional customs.

data.Sentence_cn: 约翰.杜威曾经非常严肃地指出：风俗在形成个人行为方面所起的作用
data.Sentence: John Dewey has said in all seriousness that the part played by custom in shaping the behaviour of the individual,

data.Sentence_cn: 和一个对风俗的任何影响相比，
data.Sentence: as against any way in which he can affect traditional custom,

data.Sentence_cn: 就好像他本国语言的总词汇量
data.Sentence: is as the proportion of the total vocabulary of his mother tongue

data.Sentence_cn: 和自己咿呀学语时他家庭所接纳的他的词汇量之比。
data.Sentence: against those words of his own baby talk that are taken up into the vernacular of his family.

data.Sentence_cn: 当一个人认真地研究自发形成的社会秩序时，
data.Sentence: When one seriously studies the social orders that have had the opportunity to develop autonomously,

data.Sentence_cn: 杜威的比喻就是他实事求是观察得来的形象化的说法。
data.Sentence: the figure becomes no more than an exact and matter-of-fact observation.

data.Sentence_cn: 个人的生活史首先是适应
data.Sentence: The life history of the individual is first and foremost an accommodation

data.Sentence_cn: 他的社团世代相传形成的生活方式和准则。
data.Sentence: to the patterns and standards traditionally handed down in his community.

data.Sentence_cn: 从他呱呱坠地的时刻起，
data.Sentence: From the moment of his birth,

data.Sentence_cn: 他所生于其中的风俗就开始塑造他的经历和行为规范。
data.Sentence: the customs into which he is born shape his experience and behaviour.

data.Sentence_cn: 到会说话时，他就是传统文化塑造的一个小孩子；
data.Sentence: By the time he can talk, he is the little creature of his culture,

data.Sentence_cn: 等他长大了，能做各种事了，
data.Sentence: and by the time he is grown and able to take part in its activities,

data.Sentence_cn: 他的社团的习惯就是他的习惯，他的社团的信仰就是他的信仰，他的社团不能做的事就是他不能做的事。
data.Sentence: its habits are his habits, its beliefs his beliefs, its impossibilities his impossibilities.

data.Sentence_cn: 每一个和他诞生在同一个社团中的孩子和他一样具有相同的风俗；
data.Sentence: Every child that is born into his group will share them with him,

data.Sentence_cn: 而在地球的另一边，诞生在另一个社团的孩子与他就是少有相同的风俗。
data.Sentence: and no child born into one on the opposite side of the globe can ever achieve the thousandth part.

data.Sentence_cn: 没有任何一个社会问题比得上风俗的作用问题更要求我们对它理解。
data.Sentence: There is no social problem it is more incumbent upon us to understand than this of the role of custom.

data.Sentence_cn: 直到我们理解了风俗的规律性和多样性，
data.Sentence: Until we are intelligent as to its laws and varieties,

data.Sentence_cn: 我们才能明白人为生活中主要的复杂现象。
data.Sentence: the main complicating facts of human life must remain unintelligible.

data.Sentence_cn: 对风俗的研究才是全面的，才会有收获，只有在某些基本的主张被接受下来、
data.Sentence: The study of custom can be profitable only after certain preliminary propositions have been accepted,

data.Sentence_cn: 同时有些主张被激烈反对时。
data.Sentence: and some of these propositions have been violently opposed.

data.Sentence_cn: 首先，任何科学研究都要求
data.Sentence: In the first place, any scientific study requires that there be no

data.Sentence_cn: 人们对可供考虑的诸多因素不能厚此薄彼，偏向某一方面。
data.Sentence: preferential weighting of one or another of the items in the series it selects for its consideration.

data.Sentence_cn: 在一切争议较小的领域里，如对仙人掌、白蚁或星云性质的研究，
data.Sentence: In all the less controversial fields, like the study of cacti or termites or the nature of nebulae,

data.Sentence_cn: 应采取的研究方法是把有关各方面的材料汇集起来，同时注意任何可能出现的异常情况和条件。
data.Sentence: the necessary method of study is to group the relevant material and to take note of all possible variant forms and conditions.

data.Sentence_cn: 例如，用这种方法，我们完全掌握了天文学的规律和昆虫群居的习性。
data.Sentence: In this way, we have learned all that we know of the laws of astronomy, or of the habits of the social insects, let us say.

data.Sentence_cn: 只是在对人类自身的研究。主要的社会科学
data.Sentence: It is only in the study of man himself that the major social sciences

data.Sentence_cn: 建立在本土变化，即西方文明上。
data.Sentence: have substituted the study of one local variation, that of Western civilization.

data.Sentence_cn: 人类学按其定义来说就无法存在，
data.Sentence: Anthropology was by definition impossible,

data.Sentence_cn: 只要我们同原始人，
data.Sentence: as long as these distinctions between ourselves and the primitive,

data.Sentence_cn: 我们同野蛮人，我们同异教徒之间存有的区别在人的思想中占主工导地位。
data.Sentence: ourselves and the barbarian, ourselves and the pagan, held sway over people's minds.

data.Sentence_cn: 我们首先需要达到这样一种成熟的程度：
data.Sentence: It was necessary first to arrive at that degree of sophistication

data.Sentence_cn: 不用自己的信仰去反对我们邻居的迷信。
data.Sentence: where we no longer set our own belief against our neighbour's superstition.

data.Sentence_cn: 必须认识到，这些建立在相同前提基础上的风俗，暂且可以说是超自然的东西，
data.Sentence: It was necessary to recognize that these institutions which are based on the same premises, let us say the supernatural,

data.Sentence_cn: 必须放在一起加以考虑，我们自己的风俗和其他民族的风俗都在其中。
data.Sentence: must be considered together, our own among the rest.
